snippet: Following the Republican National Convention, President Obama added a new element to his usual stump speech, describing Mitt Romney and Congressional Republicans as backward-looking.
abstract: President Obama, preparing for the Democratic National Convention, is seizing on the just-concluded Republican convention to ramp up his argument that Mitt Romney and his party are stuck in the policies of the past and are afraid to spell out the details of their plans.
lead_paragraph: Following the Republican National Convention, President Obama added a new element to his usual stump speech, describing Mitt Romney and Congressional Republicans as backward-looking.

headline.seo: Obama Says Republicans Are Stuck in Past
headline.main: Obama Casts Republicans as Stuck in the Past
headline.print_headline: Obama Says Republicans Are Stuck In the Past
